entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pikangikum
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
